global-errors.description: The form could not be submitted because it contains errors. You should fix the following errors before trying to submit the form again.

empty-state.aria-label: This field was not filled out

errors.min-length: This field must contain at least {min} element | This field must contain at least {min} elements
errors.max-length: You have reached the maximum limit of {max} element for this field | You have reached the maximum limit of {max} elements for this field

errors.date: This field should represent a valid date
errors.time: This field should represent a valid time

errors.numeric: This field must only contain digits

errors.integer: This field must be an integer
errors.max-decimal-places: The value must not exceed {max} decimal place | The value must not exceed {max} decimal places
errors.max-value: The maximum value for this field is {max}
errors.min-value: The minimum value for this field is {min}

allow-other.label: Other option
allow-other.aria-description: Free text option for the field “{name}”.

insert.description: If none of the options apply, you may {action}.

remove.description: To choose from the available options again, you must {action}.

errors.multi-required: You must select at least one of the options
errors.required: You must select one of the options

errors.email: This field must contain a valid email
errors.url: This field must contain a valid URL
errors.max-length: The maximum length for this field is {max} character | The maximum length for this field is {max} characters
